en.title: Java Developer & Minecraft Server Specialist
en.description: Led the development of innovative mini-game features and enhanced Minecraft server infrastructure to deliver high-quality experiences for youtuber Goldenito and his viewers. Delivered solutions for performance, and monetization.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Created custom Spigot plugins, configurations, and a full-featured webstore.
Engineered performance optimizations and implemented security protections to ensure smooth gameplay for 200+ concurrent users.
Maintained and evolved the game server infrastructure to support mini-games and custom mechanics.
https://goldynet.craftingstore.net/

es.title: Java programer i Minecraft server specijalista
es.description: Vodio razvoj inovativnih mini-igara i unaprijedio infrastrukturu Minecraft servera kako bi pružio visokokvalitetno iskustvo za YouTubera Goldenita i njegove gledaoce. Razvio rješenja za performanse i monetizaciju.

list.title: Ključne odgovornosti
items: Razvio prilagođene Spigot dodatke, konfiguracije i potpuno funkcionalnu web prodavnicu.
Optimizovao performanse i implementirao sigurnosne mjere za nesmetano igranje za više od 200 korisnika istovremeno.
Održavao i unapređivao server infrastrukturu za podršku mini-igrama i prilagođenim mehanikama.
https://goldynet.craftingstore.net/

en.title: Minecraft Server Specialist
en.description: Configured and optimized traditional Minecraft gamemodes such as Skyblock, SkyPvP, and Factions, enhancing server stability, gameplay balance, and player retention.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Configured and balanced Skyblock, SkyPvP, and Factions game modes for competitiveness, and player satisfaction.
Maintained server configurations to support unique gameplay mechanics.
Designed and executed advertising strategies to attract players from competing servers and grow a loyal player base.

es.title: Specijalista za Minecraft servere
es.description: Konfigurisao i optimizovao tradicionalne Minecraft modove kao što su Skyblock, SkyPvP i Factions, poboljšavajući stabilnost servera, balans igre i zadržavanje igrača.

list.title: Ključne odgovornosti
items: Konfigurisao i balansirao Skyblock, SkyPvP i Factions modove za konkurentnost i zadovoljstvo igrača.
Održavao konfiguracije servera kako bi podržao jedinstvene mehanike igre.
Kreirao i sproveo strategije oglašavanja za privlačenje igrača sa konkurentskih servera i povećanje baze lojalnih korisnika.

en.title: Mobile App – Regional Student Competition
en.description: Participated in the Unija IT Solution regional competition, developing a mobile application tailored to the needs of an accounting firm. Collaborated in a team setting and applied Java-based development to deliver a working prototype within a limited timeframe.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Worked collaboratively in a student team to create a mobile application using Java.
Developed core features and UI logic in Android Studio based on competition requirements.
Applied problem-solving skills to address real-world accounting-related challenges.

es.title: Mobilna aplikacija – Regionalno studentsko takmičenje
es.description: Učestvovao na regionalnom takmičenju Unija IT Solution, razvijajući mobilnu aplikaciju prilagođenu potrebama knjigovodstvene firme. Radio timski i koristio razvoj u Javi za izradu funkcionalnog prototipa u ograničenom vremenskom roku.

list.title: Ključne odgovornosti
items: Radio timski sa drugim studentima na izradi mobilne aplikacije koristeći Java.
Razvio ključne funkcionalnosti i logiku korisničkog interfejsa u Android Studio okruženju prema zahtjevima takmičenja.
Primijenio vještine rješavanja problema kako bi odgovorio na izazove vezane za knjigovodstvo iz stvarnog svijeta.

en.title: Minecraft Plugin – Castle Siege
en.description: Actively developing the Castle Siege game mode plugin for Minecraft, leveraging the Spigot API and Java to bring innovative gameplay mechanics to the community. The plugin has surpassed 4000+ downloads across major platforms, and development continues based on community feedback and feature suggestions.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Designed and implemented advanced game mechanics including teams, kits, stats tracking, and map regeneration.
Engaged with the Minecraft community to collect feedback and iterate quickly on updates.
Maintained and released updates through GitHub, SpigotMC, and Modrinth platforms.
https://github.com/cbhud/CastleSiege
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/castle-siege-teams-kits-stats-map-regeneration-more.115123/
https://modrinth.com/plugin/castlesiege

es.title: Minecraft plugin – Castle Siege
es.description: Aktivno razvijam Castle Siege dodatak za Minecraft koristeći Spigot API i Java kako bih zajednici donio inovativne mehanike igranja. Dodatak je prešao 4000+ preuzimanja na velikim platformama, a razvoj se nastavlja na osnovu povratnih informacija korisnika.

list.title: Ključne odgovornosti
items: Osmislio i implementirao napredne mehanike igre uključujući timove, kitove, statistiku i regeneraciju mapa.
Komunicirao sa Minecraft zajednicom kako bi prikupio povratne informacije i brzo iterirao ažuriranja.
Održavao i objavljivao ažuriranja putem GitHub, SpigotMC i Modrinth platformi.
https://github.com/cbhud/CastleSiege
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/castle-siege-teams-kits-stats-map-regeneration-more.115123/
https://modrinth.com/plugin/castlesiege

en.title: E-commerce Site – Organic Health Store
en.description: Developed a complete e-commerce platform for a local health store using PHP, JavaScript, AJAX, HTML, and CSS. This final university project emphasizes modern web development and security best practices, offering a robust, scalable, and user-friendly shopping experience.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Engineered secure user authentication with password hashing, input validation, and session management.
Built a dynamic admin panel for managing products, categories, orders, and reports.
Implemented interactive shopping cart and checkout functionality with AJAX for real-time updates.
Developed role-based access and centralized database architecture with optimized queries.
Designed responsive frontend UI for seamless user experience across devices.
Created utility features like live search, CSV reporting, and admin product/order tools.
https://organichealth.zya.me/index.php

es.title: E-commerce sajt – Organic Health Store
es.description: Razvio sam kompletan e-commerce sistem za lokalnu prodavnicu zdrave hrane koristeći PHP, JavaScript, AJAX, HTML i CSS. Projekat je urađen kao završni univerzitetski rad, sa fokusom na moderne veb tehnologije i sigurnosne prakse, pružajući skalabilno i korisniku prilagođeno online iskustvo.

list.title: Ključne odgovornosti
items: Razvijena sigurna autentifikacija korisnika sa hash-ovanjem lozinki i upravljanjem sesijama.
Napravljen admin panel za upravljanje proizvodima, kategorijama, porudžbinama i izveštajima.
Implementiran interaktivni korpa i checkout sistem sa AJAX-om za ažuriranja u realnom vremenu.
Korišćen sistem uloga i centralizovana baza podataka sa optimizovanim upitima.
Dizajniran responsive frontend koji radi na svim uređajima.
Dodate funkcije poput pretrage uživo, CSV izveštaja i admin alata za porudžbine i proizvode.
https://organichealth.zya.me/index.php
